about.html:
Ever since I was little, I've been fascinated by technology. Learning to create small games with Unity and RenPy throughout middle and high school inspired me to pursue computer science in college, where I had the opportunity to learn about web development and software engineering.

In my college years, I started my journey in web dev with a prototype matchmaking web app for students. I’ve also developed a game with my university’s game dev studio and contributed to my favorite rhythm game on GitHub. Through my experience, I learned some patterns for scalable and maintainable code while collaborating with the project developers to get new features merged into the game.
